Package silverlib.math.graph

Class PolarFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • silverlib.math.graph.Function
      • silverlib.math.graph.PolarFunction

  • public class PolarFunction
extends Function
    A representation of a polar function in a 2D polar coordinate plane
    Since:
    1.9.1.3
    Author:
    Jake Trimble

    • Constructor Detail

      • PolarFunction

        public PolarFunction​(double m,
                     double h,
                     double b)
        Initializes a PolarFunc given numerical values
        Parameters:
        m - The slope of the linear function
        h - The horizontal translation of the linear function
        b - The y-intercept of the linear function
        Since:
        1.9.1.3

      • parseFunction

        public static PolarFunction parseFunction​(java.lang.String f)
                                   throws FunctionFormatException
        Creates a LinearFunc from a textual representation
        Parameters:
        f - The function as text conforming to RegExp POLAR_REGEXP
        Returns:
        An initialized LinearFunc
        Throws:
        FunctionFormatException - If f does not match the proper RegExp
        Since:
        1.9.1.3
